pages.privacy-policy: ValleyInn Privacy Policy - Your Data Privacy Matters to Us 18+ HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact ValleyInn ValleyInn Privacy Policy At ValleyInn, we prioritize the protection of your personal information. This Privacy Policy elucidates our practices concerning the collection, utilization, and safeguarding of data we gather from users of our website and services. Information Collection We gather personal data through various means, including but not limited to, voluntary submissions (such as when you register on our site or subscribe to our newsletter), automatic data collection technologies (e.g., cookies), and third-party sources. Usage of Information The data we collect is employed to improve user experience, customize our content and services, process transactions, administer promotions, conduct research and analysis, and fulfill legal obligations. Information Protection We implement robust security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal data. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is entirely secure. Disclosure of Information We may disclose your personal information to our trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering our services. We may also disclose information when legally required or to protect our rights or the safety of others. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal data from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete such information. Changes to This Policy We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at our discretion. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on our website. Continued use of our services after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy. The ValleyInn website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline ValleyInn Discover Your Perfect Hotel Journey Navigation Home About Us Casino Contact Us Important Links Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions
